lead_paragraph: A review by The New York Times of thousands of court records and internal agency documents showed that over the last 10 years more than 200 employees of the Department of Homeland Security have taken nearly $15 million in bribes while being paid to protect the nation’s borders and enforce immigration laws. Here are some of cases we have highlighted from that investigation.
